data.title: Andalusia Blue Beach Hurghada, Hurghada (updated prices 2024)
data.meta_description: Situated in the centre of Hurghada, Andalusia Blue Beach Hurghada has a private beach area, a garden, free WiFi, and free private parking for guests who...
data.text:
Situated in the centre of Hurghada, Andalusia Blue Beach Hurghada has a private beach area, a garden, free WiFi, and free private parking for guests who drive. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also has a restaurant and a sun terrace. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. Some units in the aparthotel have private entrance and are fitted with dressing room and outdoor furniture. Some of the units have a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and bathrobes. At the aparthotel, certain units are equipped with a kettle and fruits. There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available. Bike hire and car hire are available at this aparthotel and the area is popular for hiking. The aparthotel has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open. Albatros White Beach is 1 km from the aparthotel, while Marina Sports Club Beach is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hurghada International Airport, 4 km from Andalusia Blue Beach Hurghada.

Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.8 for a two-person trip.
